enchantment.riposte.name: Riposte
enchantment.riposte.description: [key.trigger.on_parry](On Parry:) For [key.variable.positive](3) seconds your next attack has [key.variable.positive]({0}) [key.stat.attack.speed].
enchantment.frenzy.name: Frenzy
enchantment.frenzy.description: After a successful hit, gain {0} attack speed and {1} move speed for 4 seconds. Stacks up to 3 times.
enchantment.double_strike.name: Double Strike
enchantment.double_strike.description: After a successful hit, there is a {0} chance the target is hit again for {1} damage after a short delay.
